trans-unit.source: Register your client app with the Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Register your client app with the Azure Active Directory

trans-unit.source: Navigate to **Active Directory** in the [Azure Management Portal], then click your directory.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to **Active Directory** in the [Azure Management Portal], then click your directory.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Applications** tab at the top, then click to **ADD** an app.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Applications** tab at the top, then click to **ADD** an app.

trans-unit.source: Click **Add an application my organization is developing**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Add an application my organization is developing**.

trans-unit.source: In the Add Application Wizard, enter a **Name** for your application and click the **Native Client Application** type.
trans-unit.target: In the Add Application Wizard, enter a **Name** for your application and click the **Native Client Application** type.

trans-unit.source: In the **Redirect URI** box, enter the /login/done endpoint for your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: In the **Redirect URI** box, enter the /login/done endpoint for your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: This value should be similar to https://todolist.azure-mobile.net/login/done.
trans-unit.target: This value should be similar to https://todolist.azure-mobile.net/login/done.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Configure** tab for the native application and copy the **Client ID**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Configure** tab for the native application and copy the **Client ID**.

trans-unit.source: Scroll the page down to the **permissions to other applications** section and click the **Add application** button.
trans-unit.target: Scroll the page down to the **permissions to other applications** section and click the **Add application** button.

trans-unit.source: Choose **Other** from the Show menu and search for todo.
trans-unit.target: Choose **Other** from the Show menu and search for todo.

trans-unit.source: Click **TodoList** to add it the mobile service you registered earlier and click the checkmark for done.
trans-unit.target: Click **TodoList** to add it the mobile service you registered earlier and click the checkmark for done.

trans-unit.source: Grant access to the mobile service application.
trans-unit.target: Grant access to the mobile service application.

trans-unit.source: Your mobile service is now configured in AAD to receive single sign-on logins from your app.
trans-unit.target: Your mobile service is now configured in AAD to receive single sign-on logins from your app.
